Description:
The SharePoint Developer & Administrator will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining SharePoint applications and sites. They will also be responsible for managing and administering SharePoint environments. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of SharePoint architecture, development methodologies, and best practices. They should be able to work independently and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions.Responsibilities:Design, develop, and implement SharePoint solutions, including custom applications, workflows, and web parts.
Create and maintain SharePoint sites, lists, libraries, and permissions.
Perform regular maintenance and troubleshooting of SharePoint environments, including performance monitoring and optimization.
Collaborate with business users to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
Provide training and support to end users on SharePoint features and functionality.
Stay up-to-date with the latest SharePoint trends, technologies, and best practices.
Manage SharePoint security, including user access and permissions.
Assist in the migration of SharePoint sites and content.
Participate in the planning and execution of SharePoint upgrades and patches.
Document and maintain technical and process documentation related to SharePoint.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
4-7 years of experience in SharePoint development and administration.
Strong knowledge of SharePoint architecture and best practices.
Experience with SharePoint Online and Office 365.
Proficient in SharePoint development tools and technologies, including SharePoint Designer, Visual Studio, and PowerShell scripting.
Experience with SharePoint migration tools and methodologies.
Ability to work independently and take ownership of projects.
Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
SharePoint development and customization
SharePoint administration and maintenance
SharePoint workflows and business process automation
SharePoint Designer and Visual Studio
PowerShell scripting for SharePoint
